commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Sorry for asking everyone to come over here all of a sudden.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Thanks for coming today, everyone!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: So, Chika and I were talking, and we just can't give up on the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah. When we thought about how Î¼'s, Aqours, and all the Nijigasaki school idols would be performing together on the main stage, we knew we just have to make it happen!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I was wondering why you called us all here. And you don't need to tell me twice. I feel the same way.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed, I also feel that way.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I knew we all felt the same way! So that said, let's help the committee out so we can get the School Idol Festival back on track!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What, why's your mouth hanging open?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: O-Oh, please, don't get the wrong idea! I think she's just so surprised she can't speak. Because, well, we were thinking the same thing.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You were?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! I had the same idea, so I called the Festival Committee with Ayumu, saying that we'd do anything to help open the festival again.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ahaha, that sounds like you.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow, that's some real initiative!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Giggle* Sure is. That's our club president!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: So, what did the committee members say?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Er, well, about that...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Oh, so that's what was going on.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: So on top of the venue problem, the committee disbanded and the main members all dropped out, huh. Hmm, that's one heavy burden on top of another.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: They're right about it being pointless if they drop the scope, too.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: But even so, all of us--

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: No, everyone who loves school idols can't want to just give up on the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, that's the spirit! Besides, we've found out exactly why it got canceled, so that means if we solve that problem, we can get the festival back on track.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: There's hope!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If we put our heads together, I think it'll go over well! Let's do our best, everyone! Er, but I still don't know what we need to do.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I figured you'd say that.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* I feel a bit more cheerful now. And if you don't know what to do, we can probably figure it out if we all think on it.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Well, whatever we do, we'll have to find a venue. How should we look for it, though?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Can we ask the founding members who left to come back, somehow?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I see. If we get them back, the solution may become clear.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But, hey, we don't even know what they're like, you know? How are we gonna ask them?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: You should probably call the committee head again, zura.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Y-Yeah, good idea. And...someone could look up info on the past events?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'll check it out. Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Ah, found it! Take a look.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Uh, who? Who am I looking at? *Yawn* The small letters are making me sleepy. G'night.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hey, no sleeping on the job! Wake up! Look, right here! There's a familiar face.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Huh? Wh-Who?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: This one here, Kaoruko. She's really famous. They say she built the School Idol Festival from the ground up all on her own.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I-I know her, too!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: She wasn't actually a school idol herself, but she was a big fan of them just like me and supported them in all sorts of ways.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh, I know her, too! She's pretty well-known!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You know, she sounds kind of like you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wh-Whoa, we're not nearly on the same level! But she loved school idols and started an event for them, huh.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I wonder what kind of person she is? I want to meet her and hear her out.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Let's go and speak to this Kaoruko, then.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: If she was involved in starting the first School Idol Festival, she must be particularly passionate about it. I can't imagine she'd watch this happen in silence.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But wouldn't the committee people have already contacted her? Wouldn't that mean it didn't work out?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: No, we can't jump to that conclusion yet. How about you talk to the committee head again, including about that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good idea. I'll give that a try. It's worth a go! And if it doesn't work, let's think of something else.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! Let's give every option we've got a try!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeahhh!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: U-Um, everyone! Sorry, but it's almost time for the clubs to head home.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, sorry for keeping you so long! Let's all head home, then.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hold on a sec, Honoka! We're all here, on a day with no school? Let's go have some fun!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I agree with that! What does everyone want to do?
(Yoshiko) To the gathering place of fallen angels, Harajuku!
(Kasumi) I'm pretty hungry!
(Honoka) I want to go to your house.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Fine, fine. How about we just all go where we want, then?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm for that!
Excuse me. Is the student council president in at the moment?

commands.speaker: Student Council Member
commands.line: Oh, I'm sorry. The president left this morning on important business.
I see. Is she always like that?

commands.speaker: Student Council Member
commands.line: Oh, no, today was an exception. She seems to be really serious about whatever it was.
So, someone who should stand at the top of the student body, guiding it along, is putting herself first. I knew it. I have to change things.
